google.description: More than a thousand years after humankind had been brought to the brink of extinction by an alien race known as the Hunwei, when most thought the Hunwei to be a myth, Adar believed that the Hunwei would return and resume the fight. Adar and his reluctant son Jorad continued to search for a way to defend their people. This time, without the technology of their fathers, there will be nothing standing between them and the entire capture or destruction of the human race.
google.title: Shadows of Bloodshed: Part One of War of the Fathers
